testimonials.name: Michael Richardson
testimonials.title: Exceptional Performance and Reliability
testimonials.content: We've been with INCX for over 3 years now, and their dedicated servers have been absolutely rock solid. The performance is outstanding, and we've experienced 100% uptime on our critical infrastructure. Their support team is knowledgeable and responds within minutes, even at 3 AM. Couldn't be happier with the service.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: Best Colocation Provider We've Worked With
testimonials.content: After trying several colocation providers, INCX stands out significantly. Their Detroit facility is top-notch, the network connectivity is excellent, and the remote hands support saves us countless trips to the data center. The pricing is transparent and fair, with no hidden fees. Highly recommend for anyone looking for reliable colocation services.

testimonials.name: James Martinez
testimonials.title: Scaled Our Business with INCX
testimonials.content: Started with one dedicated server and now running 15+ servers with INCX. They've been instrumental in our growth. The ability to get servers provisioned within 24 hours has been game-changing for our business. Network performance is consistently excellent with their unmetered bandwidth.

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.title: Perfect for Our Streaming Platform
testimonials.content: We use multiple VPS instances for our streaming platform, and the performance has been exceptional. The KVM virtualization provides true dedicated resources, and we've never experienced the 'noisy neighbor' issues we had with other providers. The instant provisioning is a huge plus.

testimonials.name: Robert Thompson
testimonials.title: Great Service with Minor Room for Improvement
testimonials.content: Overall very satisfied with INCX. The servers are reliable, support is responsive, and the network is fast. Only minor issue was initial setup took slightly longer than expected, but support kept us informed throughout. Would definitely recommend to others.

testimonials.name: Lisa Anderson
testimonials.title: Unbeatable Value for Money
testimonials.content: We migrated from AWS to INCX dedicated servers and cut our hosting costs by 60% while getting better performance. The migration support was excellent, and they helped us every step of the way. The no setup fees and month-to-month contracts gave us confidence to make the switch.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.title: Perfect for Game Server Hosting
testimonials.content: Running multiple game servers on INCX hardware. The low latency to major US cities is excellent, and the DDoS protection included has saved us multiple times. CPU performance on the dual Xeon setups is fantastic for our game servers.

testimonials.name: Amanda White
testimonials.title: Secure and Compliant Infrastructure
testimonials.content: Security was our top priority, and INCX delivered. Their SOC audited data centers, biometric access controls, and 24/7 monitoring give us peace of mind. The compliance documentation was thorough and helped with our audits. Excellent for financial services.

testimonials.name: Carlos Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Developer-Friendly Hosting
testimonials.content: As a developer, I appreciate the flexibility INCX provides. Full root access, ability to upload custom ISOs, and no restrictions on what we can run (within legal bounds) makes this perfect for development and testing. The snapshot feature has saved me countless hours.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Lee
testimonials.title: Outstanding Support Team
testimonials.content: What sets INCX apart is their support team. They're not just ticket responders but actual engineers who understand complex issues. They've helped us optimize our setup, suggested improvements, and even helped with issues outside their scope. True 24/7 support, not just an answering service.

testimonials.name: Mark Stevens
testimonials.title: Great Starting Point for Startups
testimonials.content: Started with a small VPS and love the ability to scale up as needed. The pricing is very competitive, and no long-term contracts meant we could start small without huge commitments. Support helped us migrate from our previous provider for free.

testimonials.name: Patricia Brown
testimonials.title: Handles Black Friday Traffic with Ease
testimonials.content: Our e-commerce site gets hammered during Black Friday, and INCX servers handle it without breaking a sweat. The unmetered bandwidth means we never worry about overage charges during peak times. Performance monitoring tools included are very helpful.

testimonials.name: Thomas Wilson
testimonials.title: Professional Data Center Operations
testimonials.content: I've worked with many data centers, and INCX runs a tight ship. Their facilities are immaculate, procedures are well-documented, and the staff is professional. Remote hands service is reasonably priced and they document everything with photos.

testimonials.name: Rachel Green
testimonials.title: Excellent Network Performance
testimonials.content: The network performance is what keeps us with INCX. Multiple tier-1 carriers, intelligent routing, and consistent low latency across the US. We serve content to millions of users, and the network has never been a bottleneck.

testimonials.name: Brian Miller
testimonials.title: Enterprise Quality at SMB Prices
testimonials.content: We get enterprise-level hardware and support at prices that work for our growing SaaS business. The Dell PowerEdge servers are rock solid, IPMI/iDRAC access is invaluable, and the fact that they own their hardware means better prices for us.
